name: Newborn Workflow Set, Elements
description:
I'm so excited to share my complete newborn workflow with all of you! These actions have helped to save me valuable time and money while editing. If you've ever wondered how I am able to edit a complete gallery within 45 minutes, this is the answer.

This set includes the following actions:
Light & Airy, designed to give your images a soft and warm look.
Smooth Me Out Baby!, My secret PORTRAITURE settings for newborn photography.

PLEASE NOTE: It is the responsibility of the end user to have the PORTRAITURE plug in installed PRIOR to purchase. Refunds will not be given to those who fail to do so. Must have a basic understanding of how to load, use actions and layering masks. Please do not send emails with questions about how to load actions or use layering masks. 

This action is a digital download, NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES are permitted under any circumstances. All actions are copyright Ashlyn Dawson Photography. SHARING and/or reselling is not permitted and will result in immediate legal action.

description:

name: Newborn E-mail Templates
description:
As photographers, we wear many hats. We are: marketers, accountants, client care specialists and advertisers among many other things. Many of us are also moms, wives, daughters, sisters and friends. 

E-mailing clients back and forth was very time consuming. Instead of customizing an e-mail for each client I created 10 commonly sent templates from the moment my clients initially contact me to the moment they receive their galleries. 

The Newborn E-mail Templates will help to streamline your workflow, increase your efficiency by responding to e-mails quickly, cut down work hours and eliminate the tedious and seemingly endless task of e-mailing. Spend less time e-mailing and more time doing what you love, better yet, spend more time with those whom you love!


This PDF is designed to serve as a starting point for newborn photographers. It is recommended that you tweak these templates to suit your specific business needs.

- Initial E-mail Response For New Client Inquiries
- Client Asking For A Discount
- Client Is Requesting A Style Contrary To Yours
- Confirming Session Info
- Thank You E-Mail (Immediately Following Session)
- Viewing Gallery: Digital Downloads
- Viewing Gallery: When Offering A CD or USB
- Viewing Gallery: Online Sales
- In Person Sales Session


This template is a digital download, NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES are permitted under any circumstances. All templates are copyright Ashlyn Dawson Photography. Sharing and/or reselling is not permitted and will result in immediate legal action.

name: Smooth Me Out Baby! Photoshop
description:
Smooth Me Out Baby! is a skin smoothening action that utilizes all the perfect portraiture setting to create that soft, smooth and dreamy look for your newborn images. 

Have you struggled with obtaining that soft look with your newborn images? Ever wanted your images to have that creaminess we all melt for? Ever wonder what PORTRAITURE settings the pros use to perfect their images? Look no further. Smooth Me Out Baby! is a convenient action equipped with Ashlyn Dawson's "secret" PORTRAITURE settings for that perfectly sweet, soft and creamy newborn finish!

No need to fiddle around with PORTRAITURE settings. No need to complete each step one by one. This convenient action does all the hard work for you! Simply select the action, click play and your newborn images will be as smooth as a baby's bum!

Reviews:

I've tried many different skin smoothing actions in my workflow and I have to say, the ""Smooth Me Out Baby"" by Ashlyn Dawson rocks!! I love how quick it runs and how easy it is to mask off areas you don't want it applied to. It takes all the guesswork and time out of trying to manipulate the portraiture plug-in to get it where I like it. She's made it easy for me and I LOVE it!! - Robin Long Photography 

PLEASE NOTE: It is the responsibility of the end user to have the PORTRAITURE plug in installed PRIOR to purchase. Refunds will not be given to those who fail to do so. Must have a basic understanding of how to load, use actions and layering masks. Please do not send emails with questions about how to load actions or use layering masks. 

This action is a digital download, NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES are permitted under any circumstances. All actions are copyright Ashlyn Dawson Photography. Sharing and/or reselling is not permitted and will result in immediate legal action.
